Questions.GroundTruth: There are more intermediate people than beginners or advanced ones.

Questions.Question: Are there more recurrent sports practiced by users? List the top 3 most recurrent sports
Questions.GroundTruth: Most recurrent sports are Hiking, Yoga and walking

Questions.Question: How many people are there who do not practice any sport? List them
Questions.GroundTruth: 2 people do not practice any sport: Maria Russo and Michael Jonson

Questions.Question: Do people who never practice sport always fail in completing the proposed poses? Show the examples.
Questions.GroundTruth: No. For example Maria did successfully all the 3 poses and Michael did successfully 2 poses out of 3

Questions.Question: Are there more people who practice sports regularly, occasionally or never?
Questions.GroundTruth: There are more people practicing sports regularly

Questions.Question: What is the success rate for beginners in total (compute it as all poses successfully completed by beginners and the total poses made by beginners)?
Questions.GroundTruth: Success Rate for all beginners is approximately 70%

Questions.Question: What is the failure rate for beginners (compute it as all poses failed by beginners and the total poses made by beginners)?
Questions.GroundTruth: Failure rate for all beginners is 30%

Questions.Question: Are there poses which are more likely to be failed by beginners (compute it as the total number in which the pose has been failed by beginners divided by the total number in which that pose has been done. Express it in percentage)
Questions.GroundTruth: Guerriero and granchio pose have highest failure rate of 36% (4 out of 11)

Questions.Question: What is the success rate for intermediate in total (compute it as all poses successfully completed by intermediate and the total poses made by intermediates)?
Questions.GroundTruth: Success Rate for all intermediate is 60%

Questions.Question: What is the failure rate for intermediate (compute it as all poses failed by intermediate and the total poses made by intermediate)?
Questions.GroundTruth: Failure rate for all intermediate is 40%

Questions.Question: Are there poses which are more likely to be failed by intermediates? (compute it as the total number in which one pose has been failed by intermediates divided by the total number in which that pose has been done. Express it in percentage)
Questions.GroundTruth: Lottatore have highest failure rate of 46% (7 fails out of 15)
